name: Blackjack Legend of the 3 eggs
description:
This is a short JRPG I wanted to try since a few Easters I would do an animation that parodies the legend of Zelda but wanted to try making a stand alone short game to also try my hands at making an action rpg without using an RPGmaker this time.

1st time Blackjack appeared

Overtime some colors and designs has been changed.

2nd time now with more names (Warning audio shift mid way)

At this point an rpg was in need and I wanted to challenge myself.
The game productions was going so well I even made an optional turn base battle system.
